pages.title: Using Reagents
pages.text: Using Mermaids Gems as a Base instead of Blaze Powder results in a much more reactive potion. Not only does this allow you to add your new range of additional magical ingredients to your Potions, but also use some of them as additional Reagent. Each of those Reagents modifies the resulting properties of your Potions. Each Reagent can only be used once per recipe.
Doubles Duration.
Flat increase in Potency.
Creates Splash Potions.
Creates Lingering Potions - also requires Gunpowder as reagent$(br2)Allows you to create Tipped Arrows, if you supply Arrows instead of Bottles.
Makes Effects not show any particles.
Adds a short flat bonus to the Potions Duration.
Slight multiplicative Potency bonus.
Adds a very weird taste and smell to the potion, making it unidentifiable.$(br)Also makes its color completely black.
Changes all otherwise negative Effects to their positive ones.
Tiny multiplicative bonus to both Duration and Potency.
Greatly increases Potency of all negative Effects.
Big flat bonus to Potency, at the cost of adding a random negative Effect.
Adds a random positive Effect.
$(italic)Absorbs the last drops of what remains of your previous brew.$()$(br2)Small chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously.
$(italic)Similar to Stardust, but much more potent.$()$(br2)Guaranteed chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously, at slightly decreased Potency.
Increases the Potions Potency at the beginning, but wearing off fast over time.
Negates the duration penalty for Lingering Potions as well as for Tipped Arrows.
Provides a huge boost to a random stat.
Doubles the potions Duration at the cost of Potency.
Increases Yield, allowing you to brew an additional potion.
Increases Potency and adds 30 seconds to the Duration, but drastically lowers Yield.
Makes the Potion much more smooth, resulting in it being way faster to drink. Might come in handy when every second is crucial.
Doubles the Potions Potency, at the cost of Duration.
Flat Potency bonus for all positive Effects. Additionally colors the Potions in a random color.
x2 multiplicative Duration bonus, but makes the Potion much slower to drink.
Greatly reduces the potency of negative effects or removes them entirely.
